verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> The word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came again unto me saying

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> and you בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> Now thou son אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> of man שָׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> take up עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over צֹ֖ר <S%H6865><s%> for Tyrus קִינָֽה׃ <S%H7015><s%> a lamentation

וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> And say לְצ֗וֹר <S%H6865><s%> unto Tyrus [הַיֹּשְׁבֹתֵי כ] (הַיֹּשֶׁ֙בֶת֙ <S%H3427><s%> abide ק) עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> at מְבוֹאֹ֣ת <S%H3996><s%> the entrance יָ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> of the sea רֹכֶ֙לֶת֙ <S%H7402><s%> [which art] a merchant הָֽעַמִּ֔ים <S%H5971><s%> of the people אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אִיִּ֖ים <S%H339><s%> isles רַבִּ֑ים <S%H7227><s%> for many כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> GOD צ֕וֹר <S%H6865><s%> O Tyrus אַ֣תְּ <S%H859><s%> you אָמַ֔רְתְּ <S%H559><s%> thou hast said אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I am כְּלִ֥ילַת <S%H3632><s%> I [am] of perfect יֹֽפִי׃ <S%H3308><s%> beauty

בְּלֵ֥ב <S%H3820><s%> [are] in the midst יַמִּ֖ים <S%H3220><s%> of the seas גְּבוּלָ֑יִךְ <S%H1366><s%> Thy borders בֹּנַ֕יִךְ <S%H1129><s%> thy builders כָּלְל֖וּ <S%H3634><s%> have perfected יָפְיֵֽךְ׃ <S%H3308><s%> thy beauty

בְּרוֹשִׁ֤ים <S%H1265><s%> of fir trees מִשְּׂנִיר֙ <S%H8149><s%> of Senir בָּ֣נוּ <S%H1129><s%> They have made לָ֔ךְ אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all לֻֽחֹתָ֑יִם <S%H3871><s%> all thy [ship] boards אֶ֤רֶז <S%H730><s%> cedars מִלְּבָנוֹן֙ <S%H3844><s%> from Lebanon לָקָ֔חוּ <S%H3947><s%> they have taken לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to make תֹּ֖רֶן <S%H8650><s%> masts עָלָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H5921><s%> of

אַלּוֹנִים֙ <S%H437><s%> [Of] the oaks מִבָּ֔שָׁן <S%H1316><s%> of Bashan עָשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> have they made מִשּׁוֹטָ֑יִךְ <S%H4880><s%> thine oars קַרְשֵׁ֤ךְ <S%H7175><s%> thy benches עָֽשׂוּ־ <S%H6213><s%> have made שֵׁן֙ <S%H8127><s%> [of] ivory בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the company אֲשֻׁרִ֔ים <S%H839><s%> of the Ashurites מֵאִיֵּ֖י <S%H339><s%> [brought] out of the isles [כִּתִּיִּם כ] (כִּתִּיִּֽים׃ <S%H3794><s%> Chittim ק)

שֵׁשׁ־ <S%H8336><s%> Fine linen בְּרִקְמָ֤ה <S%H7553><s%> with broidered work מִמִּצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> from Egypt הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> became מִפְרָשֵׂ֔ךְ <S%H4666><s%> was that which thou spreadest forth לִהְי֥וֹת <S%H1961><s%> became לָ֖ךְ לְנֵ֑ס <S%H5251><s%> to be thy sail תְּכֵ֧לֶת <S%H8504><s%> blue וְאַרְגָּמָ֛ן <S%H713><s%> and purple מֵאִיֵּ֥י <S%H339><s%> from the isles אֱלִישָׁ֖ה <S%H473><s%> of Elishah הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> became מְכַסֵּֽךְ׃ <S%H4374><s%> was that which covered

יֹשְׁבֵ֤י <S%H3427><s%> The inhabitants צִידוֹן֙ <S%H6721><s%> of Zidon וְאַרְוַ֔ד <S%H719><s%> and Arvad הָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become שָׁטִ֖ים <S%H7751><s%> were thy mariners לָ֑ךְ חֲכָמַ֤יִךְ <S%H2450><s%> thy wise צוֹר֙ <S%H6865><s%> [men] O Tyrus הָ֣יוּ <S%H1961><s%> become בָ֔ךְ הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they חֹבְלָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H2259><s%> [that] were in thee were thy pilots

זִקְנֵ֨י <S%H2205><s%> The ancients גְבַ֤ל <S%H1380><s%> of Gebal וַחֲכָמֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H2450><s%> and the wise הָ֣יוּ <S%H1961><s%> become בָ֔ךְ מַחֲזִיקֵ֖י <S%H2388><s%> repairing בִּדְקֵ֑ךְ <S%H919><s%> your seams כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All אֳנִיּ֨וֹת <S%H591><s%> all the ships הַיָּ֤ם <S%H3220><s%> of the sea וּמַלָּֽחֵיהֶם֙ <S%H4419><s%> with their mariners הָ֣יוּ <S%H1961><s%> become בָ֔ךְ לַעֲרֹ֖ב <S%H6148><s%> were in thee to occupy מַעֲרָבֵֽךְ׃ <S%H4627><s%> thy merchandise

פָּרַ֨ס <S%H6539><s%> They of Persia וְל֤וּד <S%H3865><s%> and of Lud וּפוּט֙ <S%H6316><s%> and of Phut הָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> were in בְחֵילֵ֔ךְ <S%H2428><s%> were in thine army אַנְשֵׁ֖י <S%H376><s%> your men מִלְחַמְתֵּ֑ךְ <S%H4421><s%> of war מָגֵ֤ן <S%H4043><s%> the shield וְכוֹבַע֙ <S%H3553><s%> and helmet תִּלּוּ־ <S%H8518><s%> they hanged בָ֔ךְ הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they נָתְנ֥וּ <S%H5414><s%> in thee they set forth הֲדָרֵֽךְ׃ <S%H1926><s%> thy comeliness

בְּנֵ֧י <S%H1121><s%> The men אַרְוַ֣ד <S%H719><s%> of Arvad וְחֵילֵ֗ךְ <S%H2428><s%> with thine army עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> were on חוֹמוֹתַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H2346><s%> [were] upon thy walls סָבִ֔יב <S%H5439><s%> round about וְגַ֨מָּדִ֔ים <S%H1575><s%> and the Gammadims בְּמִגְדְּלוֹתַ֖יִךְ <S%H4026><s%> were in thy towers הָי֑וּ <S%H1961><s%> become שִׁלְטֵיהֶ֞ם <S%H7982><s%> their shields תִּלּ֤וּ <S%H8518><s%> they hanged עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on חוֹמוֹתַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H2346><s%> upon thy walls סָבִ֔יב <S%H5439><s%> round about הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they כָּלְל֥וּ <S%H3634><s%> perfect יָפְיֵֽךְ׃ <S%H3308><s%> thy beauty

תַּרְשִׁ֥ישׁ <S%H8659><s%> Tarshish סֹחַרְתֵּ֖ךְ <S%H5503><s%> [was] thy merchant מֵרֹ֣ב <S%H7230><s%> by reason of the multitude כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all ה֑וֹן <S%H1952><s%> of all [kind of] riches בְּכֶ֤סֶף <S%H3701><s%> with silver בַּרְזֶל֙ <S%H1270><s%> iron בְּדִ֣יל <S%H913><s%> tin וְעוֹפֶ֔רֶת <S%H5777><s%> and lead נָתְנ֖וּ <S%H5414><s%> they traded עִזְבוֹנָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H5801><s%> in thy fairs

יָוָ֤ן <S%H3120><s%> Javan תֻּבַל֙ <S%H8422><s%> Tubal וָמֶ֔שֶׁךְ <S%H4902><s%> and Meshech הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they רֹֽכְלָ֑יִךְ <S%H7402><s%> they [were] thy merchants בְּנֶ֤פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> the persons אָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> of men וּכְלֵ֣י <S%H3627><s%> and vessels נְחֹ֔שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> of brass נָתְנ֖וּ <S%H5414><s%> they traded מַעֲרָבֵֽךְ׃ <S%H4627><s%> in thy market

מִבֵּ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> They of the house תּוֹגַרְמָ֑ה <S%H8425><s%> of Togarmah סוּסִ֤ים <S%H5483><s%> with horses וּפָֽרָשִׁים֙ <S%H6571><s%> and horsemen וּפְרָדִ֔ים <S%H6505><s%> and mules נָתְנ֖וּ <S%H5414><s%> traded עִזְבוֹנָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H5801><s%> in thy fairs

בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> The men דְדָן֙ <S%H1719><s%> of Dedan רֹֽכְלַ֔יִךְ <S%H7402><s%> [were] thy merchants אִיִּ֥ים <S%H339><s%> isles רַבִּ֖ים <S%H7227><s%> many סְחֹרַ֣ת <S%H5506><s%> [were] the merchandise יָדֵ֑ךְ <S%H3027><s%> of thine hand קַרְנ֥וֹת <S%H7161><s%> horns שֵׁן֙ <S%H8127><s%> of ivory [וְהֹובְנִים כ] (וְהָבְנִ֔ים <S%H1894><s%> ebony ק) הֵשִׁ֖יבוּ <S%H7725><s%> they brought אֶשְׁכָּרֵֽךְ׃ <S%H814><s%> thee [for] a present

אֲרָ֥ם <S%H758><s%> Syria סֹחַרְתֵּ֖ךְ <S%H5503><s%> [was] thy merchant מֵרֹ֣ב <S%H7230><s%> by reason of the multitude מַעֲשָׂ֑יִךְ <S%H4639><s%> of the wares of thy making בְּ֠נֹפֶךְ <S%H5306><s%> with emeralds אַרְגָּמָ֨ן <S%H713><s%> purple וְרִקְמָ֤ה <S%H7553><s%> and broidered work וּבוּץ֙ <S%H948><s%> and fine linen וְרָאמֹ֣ת <S%H7215><s%> and coral וְכַדְכֹּ֔ד <S%H3539><s%> and agate נָתְנ֖וּ <S%H5414><s%> they occupied בְּעִזְבוֹנָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H5801><s%> in thy fairs

יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> Judah וְאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they רֹכְלָ֑יִךְ <S%H7402><s%> they [were] thy merchants בְּחִטֵּ֣י <S%H2406><s%> wheat מִ֠נִּית <S%H4511><s%> of Minnith וּפַנַּ֨ג <S%H6436><s%> and Pannag וּדְבַ֤שׁ <S%H1706><s%> and honey וָשֶׁ֙מֶן֙ <S%H8081><s%> and oil וָצֹ֔רִי <S%H6875><s%> and balm נָתְנ֖וּ <S%H5414><s%> they traded מַעֲרָבֵֽךְ׃ <S%H4627><s%> in thy market

דַּמֶּ֧שֶׂק <S%H1834><s%> Damascus סֹחַרְתֵּ֛ךְ <S%H5503><s%> [was] thy merchant בְּרֹ֥ב <S%H7230><s%> in the multitude מַעֲשַׂ֖יִךְ <S%H4639><s%> of the wares of thy making מֵרֹ֣ב <S%H7230><s%> for the multitude כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all ה֑וֹן <S%H1952><s%> of all riches בְּיֵ֥ין <S%H3196><s%> in the wine חֶלְבּ֖וֹן <S%H2463><s%> of Helbon וְצֶ֥מֶר <S%H6785><s%> wool צָֽחַר׃ <S%H6713><s%> and white

וְדָ֤ן <S%H1835><s%> Dan וְיָוָן֙ <S%H3120><s%> also and Javan מְאוּזָּ֔ל <S%H235><s%> going to and fro בְּעִזְבוֹנַ֖יִךְ <S%H5801><s%> in thy fairs נָתָ֑נּוּ <S%H5414><s%> occupied בַּרְזֶ֤ל <S%H1270><s%> iron עָשׁוֹת֙ <S%H6219><s%> bright קִדָּ֣ה <S%H6916><s%> cassia וְקָנֶ֔ה <S%H7070><s%> and calamus בְּמַעֲרָבֵ֖ךְ <S%H4627><s%> were in thy market הָיָֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> become
דְּדָן֙ <S%H1719><s%> Dedan רֹֽכַלְתֵּ֔ךְ <S%H7402><s%> [was] thy merchant בְבִגְדֵי־ <S%H899><s%> clothes חֹ֖פֶשׁ <S%H2667><s%> in precious לְרִכְבָּֽה׃ <S%H7396><s%> for chariots

עֲרַב֙ <S%H6152><s%> Arabia וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all נְשִׂיאֵ֣י <S%H5387><s%> and all the princes קֵדָ֔ר <S%H6938><s%> of Kedar הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they סֹחֲרֵ֣י <S%H5503><s%> in these [were they] thy merchants יָדֵ֑ךְ <S%H3027><s%> with thee בְּכָרִ֤ים <S%H3733><s%> in lambs וְאֵילִים֙ <S%H352><s%> and rams וְעַתּוּדִ֔ים <S%H6260><s%> and goats בָּ֖ם סֹחֲרָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H5503><s%> were your customers

רֹכְלֵ֤י <S%H7402><s%> The merchants שְׁבָא֙ <S%H7614><s%> of Sheba וְרַעְמָ֔ה <S%H7484><s%> and Raamah הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they רֹכְלָ֑יִךְ <S%H7402><s%> they [were] thy merchants בְּרֹ֨אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> with chief כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all בֹּ֜שֶׂם <S%H1314><s%> of all spices וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֶ֤בֶן <S%H68><s%> stones יְקָרָה֙ <S%H3368><s%> and with all precious וְזָהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> and gold נָתְנ֖וּ <S%H5414><s%> they occupied עִזְבוֹנָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H5801><s%> in thy fairs

חָרָ֤ן <S%H2771><s%> Haran וְכַנֵּה֙ <S%H3656><s%> and Canneh וָעֶ֔דֶן <S%H5729><s%> and Eden רֹכְלֵ֖י <S%H7402><s%> the merchants שְׁבָ֑א <S%H7614><s%> of Sheba אַשּׁ֖וּר <S%H804><s%> Asshur כִּלְמַ֥ד <S%H3638><s%> [and] Chilmad רֹכַלְתֵּֽךְ׃ <S%H7402><s%> [were] thy merchants

הֵ֤מָּה <S%H1992><s%> They רֹכְלַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H7402><s%> These [were] thy merchants בְּמַכְלֻלִ֔ים <S%H4360><s%> in all sorts בִּגְלוֹמֵי֙ <S%H1545><s%> clothes תְּכֵ֣לֶת <S%H8504><s%> [of things] in blue וְרִקְמָ֔ה <S%H7553><s%> and broidered work וּבְגִנְזֵ֖י <S%H1595><s%> and in chests בְּרֹמִ֑ים <S%H1264><s%> of rich apparel בַּחֲבָלִ֧ים <S%H2256><s%> with cords חֲבֻשִׁ֛ים <S%H2280><s%> bound וַאֲרֻזִ֖ים <S%H729><s%> and made of cedar בְּמַרְכֻלְתֵּֽךְ׃ <S%H4819><s%> among thy merchandise

אֳנִיּ֣וֹת <S%H591><s%> The ships תַּרְשִׁ֔ישׁ <S%H8659><s%> of Tarshish שָׁרוֹתַ֖יִךְ <S%H7788><s%> did sing מַעֲרָבֵ֑ךְ <S%H4627><s%> of thee in thy market וַתִּמָּלְאִ֧י <S%H4390><s%> and thou wast replenished וַֽתִּכְבְּדִ֛י <S%H3513><s%> glorious מְאֹ֖ד <S%H3966><s%> and made very בְּלֵ֥ב <S%H3820><s%> in the midst יַמִּֽים׃ <S%H3220><s%> of the seas

בְּמַ֤יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters רַבִּים֙ <S%H7227><s%> thee into great הֱבִיא֔וּךְ <S%H935><s%> have brought הַשָּׁטִ֖ים <S%H7751><s%> Thy rowers אֹתָ֑ךְ <S%H853><s%> ר֚וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> wind הַקָּדִ֔ים <S%H6921><s%> the east שְׁבָרֵ֖ךְ <S%H7665><s%> hath broken בְּלֵ֥ב <S%H3820><s%> thee in the midst יַמִּֽים׃ <S%H3220><s%> of the seas

הוֹנֵךְ֙ <S%H1952><s%> Thy riches וְעִזְבוֹנַ֔יִךְ <S%H5801><s%> and thy fairs מַעֲרָבֵ֕ךְ <S%H4627><s%> thy merchandise מַלָּחַ֖יִךְ <S%H4419><s%> thy mariners וְחֹבְלָ֑יִךְ <S%H2259><s%> and thy pilots מַחֲזִיקֵ֣י <S%H2388><s%> your repairers בִדְקֵ֣ך <S%H919><s%> of seams וְֽעֹרְבֵ֣י <S%H6148><s%> and the occupiers מַ֠עֲרָבֵךְ <S%H4627><s%> of thy merchandise וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אַנְשֵׁ֨י <S%H376><s%> your men מִלְחַמְתֵּ֜ךְ <S%H4421><s%> of war אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who בָּ֗ךְ וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all קְהָלֵךְ֙ <S%H6951><s%> that [are] in thee and in all thy company אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who בְּתוֹכֵ֔ךְ <S%H8432><s%> which [is] in the midst יִפְּלוּ֙ <S%H5307><s%> of thee shall fall בְּלֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> into the midst יַמִּ֔ים <S%H3220><s%> of the seas בְּי֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day מַפַּלְתֵּֽךְ׃ <S%H4658><s%> of thy ruin
לְק֖וֹל <S%H6963><s%> at the sound זַעֲקַ֣ת <S%H2201><s%> of the cry חֹבְלָ֑יִךְ <S%H2259><s%> of thy pilots יִרְעֲשׁ֖וּ <S%H7493><s%> shall shake מִגְרֹשֽׁוֹת׃ <S%H4054><s%> The suburbs

וְֽיָרְד֞וּ <S%H3381><s%> shall come down מֵאָנִיּֽוֹתֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H591><s%> from their ships כֹּ֚ל <S%H3605><s%> All תֹּפְשֵׂ֣י <S%H8610><s%> And all that handle מָשׁ֔וֹט <S%H4880><s%> the oar מַלָּחִ֕ים <S%H4419><s%> the mariners כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all חֹבְלֵ֣י <S%H2259><s%> [and] all the pilots הַיָּ֑ם <S%H3220><s%> of the sea אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> upon the land יַעֲמֹֽדוּ׃ <S%H5975><s%> they shall stand

וְהִשְׁמִ֤יעוּ <S%H8085><s%> to be heard עָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H5921><s%> over בְּקוֹלָ֔ם <S%H6963><s%> And shall cause their voice וְיִזְעֲק֖וּ <S%H2199><s%> against thee and shall cry מָרָ֑ה <S%H4751><s%> bitterly וְיַעֲל֤וּ <S%H5927><s%> and shall cast up עָֽפָר֙ <S%H6083><s%> dust עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over רָ֣אשֵׁיהֶ֔ם <S%H7218><s%> upon their heads בָּאֵ֖פֶר <S%H665><s%> themselves in the ashes יִתְפַּלָּֽשׁוּ׃ <S%H6428><s%> they shall wallow

וְהִקְרִ֤יחוּ <S%H7139><s%> bald אֵלַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H413><s%> and קָרְחָ֔ה <S%H7144><s%> And they shall make themselves utterly וְחָגְר֖וּ <S%H2296><s%> for thee and gird שַׂקִּ֑ים <S%H8242><s%> them with sackcloth וּבָכ֥וּ <S%H1058><s%> and they shall weep אֵלַ֛יִךְ <S%H413><s%> for בְּמַר־ <S%H4751><s%> for thee with bitterness נֶ֖פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> of heart מִסְפֵּ֥ד <S%H4553><s%> wailing מָֽר׃ <S%H4751><s%> [and] bitter

וְנָשְׂא֨וּ <S%H5375><s%> they shall take up אֵלַ֤יִךְ <S%H413><s%> and בְּנִיהֶם֙ <S%H5204><s%> And in their wailing קִינָ֔ה <S%H7015><s%> a lamentation וְקוֹנְנ֖וּ <S%H6969><s%> for thee and lament עָלָ֑יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> over מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> Who כְצ֔וֹר <S%H6865><s%> over thee [saying] What [city is] like Tyrus כְּדֻמָ֖ה <S%H1822><s%> like the destroyed בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst הַיָּֽם׃ <S%H3220><s%> sea

בְּצֵ֤את <S%H3318><s%> went forth עִזְבוֹנַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H5801><s%> When thy wares מִיַּמִּ֔ים <S%H3220><s%> out of the seas הִשְׂבַּ֖עַתְּ <S%H7646><s%> thou filledst עַמִּ֣ים <S%H5971><s%> people רַבִּ֑ים <S%H7227><s%> many בְּרֹ֤ב <S%H7230><s%> with the multitude הוֹנַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H1952><s%> of thy riches וּמַ֣עֲרָבַ֔יִךְ <S%H4627><s%> and of thy merchandise הֶעֱשַׁ֖רְתְּ <S%H6238><s%> thou didst enrich מַלְכֵי־ <S%H4428><s%> the kings אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth

עֵ֛ת <S%H6256><s%> In the time נִשְׁבֶּ֥רֶת <S%H7665><s%> [when] thou shalt be broken מִיַּמִּ֖ים <S%H3220><s%> by the seas בְּמַֽעֲמַקֵּי־ <S%H4615><s%> in the depths מָ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> of the waters מַעֲרָבֵ֥ךְ <S%H4627><s%> thy merchandise וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all קְהָלֵ֖ךְ <S%H6951><s%> and all thy company בְּתוֹכֵ֥ךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst נָפָֽלוּ׃ <S%H5307><s%> of thee shall fall

כֹּ֚ל <S%H3605><s%> All יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> All the inhabitants הָאִיִּ֔ים <S%H339><s%> of the isles שָׁמְמ֖וּ <S%H8074><s%> shall be astonished עָלָ֑יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> and וּמַלְכֵיהֶם֙ <S%H4428><s%> at thee and their kings שָׂ֣עֲרוּ <S%H8175><s%> afraid שַׂ֔עַר <S%H8178><s%> shall be sore רָעֲמ֖וּ <S%H7481><s%> they shall be troubled פָּנִֽים׃ <S%H6440><s%> in [their] countenance

סֹֽחֲרִים֙ <S%H5503><s%> The merchants בָּ֣עַמִּ֔ים <S%H5971><s%> among the people שָׁרְק֖וּ <S%H8319><s%> shall hiss עָלָ֑יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> and בַּלָּה֣וֹת <S%H1091><s%> at thee thou shalt be a terror הָיִ֔ית <S%H1961><s%> have become וְאֵינֵ֖ךְ <S%H369><s%> will cease עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> alway ס
